overview:
Max is the President of aiCache, the leading provider of web application acceleration.

Previous President of McBride & Associates. McBride served large commercial and government organizations. Under Mr. Robbins leadership McBride grew from eighty to over two hundred million USD profitably.

Founder and CEO of Web Business Services (WBS) WBS wholesaled Web development, hosting, and integration to the telecommunications industry. In December of 2001, WBS was acquired by McBride & Associates.

Chief Technical officer for IDT corporation.
Max create the IDT internet division, managed the deployment of a nation-wide dial-up, dedicated and web hosting service resulting in a successful public offering in 1997. IDT trades as IDTC on the New York stock exchange.

Max is a recognized international speaker who pioneered commercial internet access in the middle and far east. He is the holder of patents in voice recognition and small music device technology.

He is an avid traveler and has lived and worked in over 55 Countries. He is a fan of language and culture and spends his non-working time learning to speak Latin and Slavic dialects badly.
